solution_line_template: He needs {num_cards} valentine's cards because {num_students} x {percent_to_give} = <<{num_students}*{percent_to_give}={num_cards}>>{num_cards}
He will spend ${total_spent} on these because {num_cards} x {card_cost} = <<{num_cards}*{card_cost}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}
The proportion of his income spent is {proportion_spent} because {total_spent} / {total_money} = <<{total_spent}/{total_money}={proportion_spent}>>{proportion_spent}
This is {percent_spent}% of his income because {proportion_spent} x {percent_factor} = <<{proportion_spent}*{percent_factor}={percent_spent}>>{percent_spent}
